HPI 8240 Lancia Stratos HF 1981 Rallye Monte Carlo 6th Place B. Darniche/A. Mahé



1978 marked the official end of the works Stratos' rally career. However, in 1979, Bernard Darniche proved that a privately-owned Stratos was still capable of winning events with wins in Monte Carlo & Corsica and Tony Fassina winning Sanremo.

There were no wins for the Stratos in 1980 but, even in 1981, this was not quite the end. Darniche bought one of the very last factory-registered Stratos types of all - TOU62570 - and finished sixth in Monte Carlo.

Here is HPI's model of Darniche's 6th place Stratos from the 1980 Rallye Monte Carlo.
